MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY12 postcode area of Dunfermline, affecting properties in Goldfrum Street and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified an underground cable fault and are in the process of connecting generators to restore power, and we now expect all supplies to be restored by 2.00pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:03pm on Monday, 11 January 2021
